hotels.title: Lavish Napa Valley Vineyard Retreat with Fine-Dining Restaurant & Spa
hotels.description: Stay in the epitome of Californian elegance at The Meritage Resort and Spa, a sumptuous sanctuary nestled amidst the world-renowned grapevines of the Napa Valley. This exclusive haven boasts an onsite spa, a fine-dining restaurant serving delectable farm-to-table cuisine, and a chic bowling alley for a touch of playful luxury. Venture out to explore the picturesque wine trails, basking in the beauty of the surrounding vineyards, and indulge in a sunset dinner with panoramic views of the Napa Valley.
